text: The Unexpected Father is a 1932 American comedy film directed by Thornton Freeland and starring Slim Summerville, Zasu Pitts, and Cora Sue Collins.Stumpf p. 136 The film's sets were designed by the art director Thomas F. O'Neill. ==Cast== * Slim Summerville as Jasper Jones * Zasu Pitts as Polly Perkins * Cora Sue Collins as Pudge * Alison Skipworth as Mrs. Hawkins * Dorothy Christy as Evelyn Smythe * Grayce Hampton as Mrs. Smythe * Claud Allister as Claude * Tyrell Davis as Reggie * Tom O'Brien as Policeman * Richard Cramer as Policeman ==References== ==Bibliography== * Stumpf, Charles. ZaSu Pitts: The Life and Career. McFarland, 2010. ==External links== * Category:1932 films Category:1932 comedy films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:Films directed by Thornton Freeland Category:Universal Pictures films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Unexpected Father
